dcterms:creator: Alan W Black
dcterms:description: The CMU Wilderness dataset represents a single domain (speech utterances from the Bible) and has predominantly a single speaker per language. It is derived from the Bible in approximately 700 languages and lacks speaker diversity.
dcterms:title: CMU Wilderness

dcterms:creator: Rosana Ardila

Michael Kohler
Josh Meyer
Reuben Morais
Lindsay Saunders
Francis M Tyers
Gregor Weber
dcterms:description: Common Voice is a massively multilingual speech corpus that presents a variety of recording conditions with multiple speakers per language.
dcterms:title: Common Voice
